restarter.partial_crash_warn: Due to a partial crash, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Due to a partial crash, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minuto. Porfavor desconectate. |||| El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minutos.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minuto. |||| **%{servername}** El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minutos.

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.instruction: Hold [SPACE] for 10 seconds to dismiss this message.
